markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aldori Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=877) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Aldori Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=14)

**Prerequisites**
[Aldori Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=876)

**Requirements**
You are wielding only an Aldori dueling sword and have your other hand or hands free.

</column>

---

You can parry attacks against you with your [Aldori dueling sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=88). You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirement.

<title level="2">Aldori Parry leads to...</title>
[Aldori Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=879)
name: Aldori Parry
requirement: You are wielding only an Aldori dueling sword and have your other hand or hands free.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding only an Aldori dueling sword and have your other hand or hands free.
